item.title: VCF9 - Dark Site Edge - Part 2
item.description:
Introduction

In my last article, I showed how to deploy a Dark Site Edge on a host (with a temporary second host). However, this didn’t sit well with me, as I believe it should also be possible with just one host and without any additional tools. Spoiler alert: it works, and today I’m going to write down how to do it.

Of course, we need a few workarounds here, and I was unable to create the setup with external storage such as NFS. So today I will use vSAN ESA, even though it requires significantly more resources than NFS.
